name: Otakus Rampage (alpha)
description:
Otakus Rampage is a first person shooter combined with tower defense.

 Where you'll have to defend a main objective from the hordes of zombie otakus!

You will have different types of weapons and towers to help you!!

------------------------------------------

Important:

Otakus Rampage is still in development, this is an alpha version. We are working hard to improve and add new features to make the game more enjoyable!

------------------------------------------

Developers:

Wilder Abanto, Italo Franco, Mateo Blanco, José López 

Andrés Castañeda, Guillermo Romaní, Luis Conca, William Gálvez
